mapper.select: select fv.id,fv.name,fv.unit,fv.fee_key_id feeKeyId,fk.name feeKeyName from room_info ri left join apartment_fee_value afv on ri.apartment_id=afv.apartment_id and afv.is_deleted=0 left join fee_value fv on afv.fee_value_id=fv.id and fv.is_deleted=0 left join fee_key fk on fv.fee_key_id=fk.id and fk.is_deleted=0 where ri.is_deleted=0 and ri.id=#{id};
